title: Claude Monet Water Lilies T-Shirt
description:
T-shirt developed from Claude Monet’s Water Lilies, 1906, from The Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

Enjoy the water lilies of Giverny! “One instant, one aspect of nature contains it all,” said Claude Monet, referring to his late masterpieces, the water landscapes that he produced at his home in Giverny between 1897 and his death in 1926. These works replaced the varied contemporary subjects he had painted from the 1870s through the 1890s with a single, timeless motif—water lilies.

  • Sizes: S, M, L, XL, XXL
  • Material: 100% Cotton.
